Cucumber Reporting Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2017-09-12  | Version: 1.0.12-SNAPSHOT
Cucumber Reporting Maven Plugin
Parent Project
  • Cucumber Reports
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

cucumber-reporting:generate

Full name:

com.github.mkolisnyk:cucumber-reporting-maven-plugin:1.0.12-SNAPSHOT:generate

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: verify.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
breakdownConfig String - Defines path to breakdown report configuration file. Parameter is needed only when breakdownReport parameter is true.
breakdownReport boolean - Flag identifying that breakdown report is to be generated. If set, the breakdownConfig parameter should be defined as well.
consolidatedReport boolean - Flag identifying that consolidated report is to be generated. If set, the consolidatedReportConfig parameter should be defined as well.
consolidatedReportConfig String - Defines path to consolidated report configuration file. Parameter is needed only when consolidatedReport parameter is true.
excludeCoverageTags List - (no description)
featureMapConfig String - (no description)
featureMapReport boolean - Flag identifying that feature map report is to be generated. If set, the featureMapConfig parameter should be defined as well.
featureOverviewChart boolean - Flag identifying that feature overview chart is to be generated.
includeCoverageTags List - (no description)
isCoverageReport boolean - Flag identifying if coverage report is to be generated.
isDetailedAggregatedReport boolean - Flag identifying if detailed aggregated report is to be generated.
isDetailedReport boolean - Flag identifying if detailed report is to be generated.
isOverviewReport boolean - Flag identifying if overview report is to be generated.
isUsageReport boolean - Flag identifying if usage report is to be generated.
jsonReportPaths List - (no description)
jsonUsageReportPaths List - (no description)
knownErrorsConfig String - (no description)
knownErrorsReport boolean - (no description)
outputFolder String - (no description)
pdfPageSize String - (no description)
reportPrefix String - (no description)
screenShotLocation String - (no description)
screenShotSize String - (no description)
toPDF boolean - (no description)

Parameter Details

breakdownConfig:

Defines path to breakdown report configuration file. Parameter is needed only when breakdownReport parameter is true.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

breakdownReport:

Flag identifying that breakdown report is to be generated. If set, the breakdownConfig parameter should be defined as well.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

consolidatedReport:

Flag identifying that consolidated report is to be generated. If set, the consolidatedReportConfig parameter should be defined as well.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

consolidatedReportConfig:

Defines path to consolidated report configuration file. Parameter is needed only when consolidatedReport parameter is true.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

excludeCoverageTags:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

featureMapConfig:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

featureMapReport:

Flag identifying that feature map report is to be generated. If set, the featureMapConfig parameter should be defined as well.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

featureOverviewChart:

Flag identifying that feature overview chart is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

includeCoverageTags:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

isCoverageReport:

Flag identifying if coverage report is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

isDetailedAggregatedReport:

Flag identifying if detailed aggregated report is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

isDetailedReport:

Flag identifying if detailed report is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

isOverviewReport:

Flag identifying if overview report is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

isUsageReport:

Flag identifying if usage report is to be generated.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

jsonReportPaths:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

  • Required: No

(no description)
